title: 我的世界服务端显示检测到内存泄露 怎么解决
author: zhennir
txt_content: 错误 ssHSch : 36460017.06 09:50:21 [服务器] 错误 Detected ongoing potential memory leak. 364600 packets have leaked. Top offenders17.06 09:50:21 [Server] ERROR ssHSch : 36460017.06 09:50:21 [Server] ERROR Detected ongoing potential memory leak. 364600 packets have leaked. Top offenders17.06 09:50:16 [服务器] 错误 ssHSch : 36450017.06 09:50:16 [服务器] 错误 Detected ongoing potential memory leak. 364500 packets have leaked. Top offendersrs

replies.txt_content: 问题不是很大，可以考虑更换MOD，如果不方便更换定时重启就行

replies.author: 死兄
replies.txt_content:
如果内存溢出过多可能会导致蹦服
建议升级配置
谢谢
bat右键文本打开  xmx设置的小一点试试

replies.author: kk15219883662
replies.txt_content: 哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈或或或或或或或或或或或
